name: Ball Guys
description:
(Warning, game is super buggy. I made it in a bit over an hour and wow does it show)

Press any button to spawn a Ball Guy

Hold that same button then release them to launch in a direction shown by the arrow

First to the top right side wins

Playable by 1-infinity players, or less if you can't fit that many around a keyboard

(mouse buttons and joysticks work too)
